messages.subject: Email Troubles re Those Books
messages.msgSnippet: Just a quick note to those who ve asked about the books I offered - I m getting quite a number of these messages from our server: To:
messages.messageBody:
Just a quick note to those who've asked about the books I offered -
I'm getting quite a number of these messages from our server:

To: HEM-Editor@...
Subject: Message delayed
From: postmaster@...
Date: Wed, 10 Apr 2002 17:11:28 -0700

Your message has been delayed and is still awaiting delivery
to the following recipient(s): (email addresses listed)
Message delayed
I/O error encountered

Now I'm not sure what all that really means, but if you wrote to me
about the books and haven't heard back yet that might be the reason.
Some seem to go through, others don't, with no apparent rhyme or
reason. We've been having trouble with our ISP all day long...
Wonderful timing, eh?

Helen
